QuestionPrompt.Transcript: What did Grace Cahill do right before she died?
Currently, what is Dan Cahill’s favorite thing to collect?
How many teams accept Grace Cahill’s challenge?
What is Grace Cahill’s cat’s name?
What does Amy save from the fire?

ScoreResponseHigh.Transcript: A perfect score! Are you a Cahill?

Scramble.Clue: Alistair Oh escaped the mansion with this famous book.

Statement.Transcript: And my new album, "Gangsta Life," is number three on the French charts.
I’m going to regret this. But I might as well regret it in Paris.
B-Benjamin Franklin was way more important than you, Jonah!
One phone call and I can mobilize help from Tokyo to Rio De Janeiro.

Introduction.Transcript: Which famous Lucian are you most like? Take this quiz to find out!

QuestionPrompt.Transcript: What are you most looking forward to about college?

Answer.Transcript: Performing cool experiments during physics lab
Becoming president of the student body

QuestionPrompt.Transcript: As a child, what was your favorite way to spend a Saturday?
It’s time to eat! What are you craving?
Which of these items can be found in your locker?

OutcomeMessage.Transcript: You’re a talented writer and have a knack for inventing new things. You’re a lot like Benjamin Franklin!
You’re incredibly smart and love studying the sciences. You’re a lot like Isaac Newton!
A natural leader, you just love being in charge. You have a lot in common with Winston Churchill!

Scramble.Clue: They don’t keep cats in this underground maze!
